lyrics.text:
’Ofa ke tokanga ma’u pē,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona;
‘I he’eku ngaahi ngāue,
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē.

Pea u kumi fai ma’u ai pē,
‘Eiki ke u ‘ilo’i koe,
‘I he’eku ngaahi lea,
Mo ‘eku ngaahi mahalo.

Pea u hangahanga fai pē,
Ki ho tu’utu’uni lelei,
Pea u fiemālie ai,
‘Eiki ‘i ho’ ‘Afio mai.

Pea u fa’a tuku koe,
Ki hoku nima to’omata’u,
He ‘oku ke ‘Afio’i,
Hoku loto kotoa pē.

Pea u fai pe ‘eku ngāue,
Pea u ‘atu kotoa pē,
‘Eiki , ki he ‘Afiona,
‘I he huafa ‘o Sīsū.

Pea u ma’u ‘iate koe,
‘A e loto fa’a kātaki,
Pea u le’o, pea lotu,
Pea ‘oua na’a ku fiu.
